name: Sacriformation
description:
A collaboration between Giginss and Terracottafrog

Sacrifice your abilities to gain ever more powerful ones in Sacriformation, a platformer where you traverse massive landscapes in search of demonic altars.

Sacriformation features:

  • Huge worlds
  • Demonic themes
  • Buggy physics
  • Gravity Shifting
  • Getting stuck in walls
  • Rendering bugs!

protip dont do gamejams in unity without practice everybody

Instructions:

WASD. Shift to sprint / teleport.

Find altars to sacrifice then augment your abilities. If an altar doesn't work yet try another one. Try to get to the final altar.
